title: No Fee 2br 1500ft  $2675 Medford/Tufts 2 bedroom Apt. Apartment
posting_body: ['NO FEE by owner:', 'Walking distance to Tufts University.', '2 family (2nd floor unit) house with 2 bedrooms, living room, dining room, front room/office, total 5 rooms plus 1 bath and an eat-in-kitchen apartment available on August 6th, 2022.', '5 minutes walking distance (2 blocks) from Tufts campus as well as 2 blocks walking to Boston Ave.', '(Bus #80, 94, 96 and 15-20 minutes walking to Red line Davis Sq).', 'Easy to access Rt.2 and Rt. 93 (2-5 minutes).', '8 minutes walk to new green line subway station.', 'There are 5 rooms total and an eat-in-kitchen with dishwasher, including storage in the basement, plenty on-street parking, plus front and rear deck.', 'Beautiful hardwood floors throughout, well-kept apartment used to be owner occupied.', 'Laundry W/D is included for using in the basement.', 'Looking for responsible, respectful graduate student or professional.', 'Non-smokers and NO pets allowed.', '$2675/month.', 'Utilities not included.', 'First and last rent plus security deposit required.', '12-month lease and references required.', 'Available 8-6-2022.', 'Email me to set up an appointment.', '(No phone calls, email only)', "Note: Real estate/rental agent, please DON'T contact/email me.", 'Thank you!']
